title: Crazylegs Crane
overview: Crazylegs Crane is a 16-episode made for television cartoon series produced by DePatieâ€“Freleng Enterprises in 1978 for The All New Pink Panther Show on ABC.In the cartoons that star Crazylegs Crane, he always goes through various misadventures (often accompanied by his son Crazylegs Crane Jr. and often deals with his frenemy, a fire-breathing dragonfly.
